thread.title: WTF | Pic: So Dublin Bus has turned Matt Damon into Hitler thanks to The Martian ad Campaign
thread.title_full: WTF | Pic: So Dublin Bus has turned Matt Damon into Hitler thanks to The Martian ad Campaign - entertainment.ie

author: Sheena McGinley
title: WTF | Pic: So Dublin Bus has turned Matt Damon into Hitler thanks to The Martian ad Campaign
text:
Matt Damon is such a hard working actor, he's even advertising Hitler biopics on the back of busses in his spare time. What a trooper.
@DublinBusGroan Matt Damon is Adolf Hitler in The Martian, brought to you by #DublinBus pic.twitter.com/Ln1TtI7s8e
— Oisín (@Molakai7) October 20, 2015 This time around, however, the star of the show is a fortuitously positioned vent. As marketing campaigns go, this is sheer brilliance.
Via Mashable
